Summary: glowing ball at high speed with long white trail
trends: There have been no other sightings in Chioggia
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1. I was in a parking lot near my house and I was going to get the car 2. Nothing 3. It was not a shooting star and even an aircraft. 4. The object is moving with straight line at high speed with the north-west. was not making any noise and had a long trail of light like falling stars but very strong. The ubject was spherical and had a light button. 5. I was still shocked, I looked to see if there were other things in the sky. 6. Disappeared on the horizon
